body_html:
Even I spent quite a time to resolve the issue when I received the error that:

ImportError: libcudnn.so.6 cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory

Later I found a Github thread which was in relation to porting to cuDNN 6 (#8828) and realized that the binary is based on version 6 of cuDNN.

Raised the issue so that others don't face the same issue.
body_text:
Even I spent quite a time to resolve the issue when I received the error that:
ImportError: libcudnn.so.6 cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory

Later I found a Github thread which was in relation to porting to cuDNN 6 (#8828) and realized that the binary is based on version 6 of cuDNN.
Raised the issue so that others don't face the same issue.
body:
Even I spent quite a time to resolve the issue when I received the error that:
```
ImportError: libcudnn.so.6 cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory
```

Later I found a Github thread which was in relation to porting to cuDNN 6 (#8828) and realized that the binary is based on version 6 of cuDNN.

Raised the issue so that others don't face the same issue.
